backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-evidence metadata describing click-to-advance updates and affected frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Includes prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, hooks, and scenes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions establishing OKLCH color palettes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML shell loading the React app into the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that renders the RVExperience inside a full-height container.
frontend/src/components/rv/ActionPlaybac: Stepper-style UI that walks users through selected checkpoint actions and advances when complete.
frontend/src/components/rv/AnimatedTrave: Crossfading Ken Burns–animated image loop used when travel video cannot play.
frontend/src/components/rv/CheckpointOve: Overlay modal letting users choose exactly two activities per checkpoint with selection validation.
frontend/src/components/rv/checkpoints.t: Defines checkpoint metadata and available actions with labels, icons, and consumption values. Provides structured data for all three journey checkpoints.
frontend/src/components/rv/JourneyHaltIs: Overlay shown after checkpoint 3 delay that displays an issue alert and resolve button.
frontend/src/components/rv/ProgressIndic: Displays journey status, checkpoint count, and progress bar based on flow state conditions. Computes status text, progress percentage, and current checkpoint dynamically.
Main coordinator for the RV flow, rendering different scenes and overlays depending on flow state. Handles transitions, timers, and user interactions to advance the journey.
frontend/src/components/rv/scenes.ts: Defines SceneData and provides preset scene objects for travel segments, halt issue, and destination.
frontend/src/components/rv/StartJourneyS: Renders the intro screen with journey description and a button to begin. Provides a visually styled start card with feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelScene.t: Shows a static travel scene with background image and descriptive text. Overlays gradients and text for readability.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelTransit: Displays a loading-style transition screen between checkpoints or before destination. Shows animated loader and context-specific messages.
frontend/src/components/rv/TravelVideoSc: Handles video playback for travel segments, with fallbacks for stalls or playback failures. Manages timing, autoplay issues, and triggers advancement callbacks.
Shows final completion screen with trip summary and restart button. Includes year footer and external link attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, logout, and status management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useRVFlow.ts: Manages the full RV journey state machine including traveling, checkpoints with action selection, playback, halt issue, and destination flow.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines a warm desert-themed color system with dark mode variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrapped around the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Extends Tailwind with custom colors, shadows, animations, and container settings using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, requirements, issues, and architecture for a Flutter web RV journey app.
